section.title: What's New in &name-core; &ver-icinga; and &name-web; &ver-icingaweb;
section.para: * core: Schedule Downtime for host and all services now works as expected
* core: Servicechecks with excluded timeperiods are correctly re-scheduled
* core: Error out if service_description is missing in service definition
* core: Added syslogd local facility
* core: Use execv for active checks w/o metacharacters
* core: Speed up loading retention.dat into the Core
* core: Initscripts handle the lock file now correctly and outputs config errors
* core: Better Solaris detection (in progress)
* core: Add event profiling option and dumping entire scheduling queue
* cgis: display_name on host/service definition will be displayed in classical UI
* cgis: multiple urls for notes|action_url on host|service definition in classical UI
* cgis: removing a comment on the classical UI does not delete all of them anymore
* idoutils: IDOMOD now has it's own object version on the NEB API, this requires both Icinga and IDOUtils to be upgraded to 1.0.2 â€“ check docs for more information upgrading_idoutils
* idoutils: Performance improvements on SQL queries and objects hash list
* core: Fixes for Notification not/incorrectly being sent/calculated
* core: A long list of patches pending on mailinglists and trackers, check the Changelog for more information
* idoutils: Fixed major bug on IDOUtils object relations, causing huge performance issues - added upgrade scripts too
To have a deeper look, please visit the Changelog
* Core code reduced and made more robust
* Core code detatached to its owning modules
* Module framework defined, extractor and installer
* Principals now works in one step (one function code)
* Instances included
* Ajax driven filters, made some new filters
* REST/Json api interface (web/api, &url-icinga-dev;issues/305)
* New summary cronk (faster, faster, faster)
* New cronk list (also categories, faster, faster, faster)
* Single click in the web interface
* Translation (not complete)
